extensionDescription.message: Monitors users typing words inside webpages and if it matches words from the BIP39 recovery phrase dictionary, warn the user.

one.message: Did you really want to share your 'Secret Recovery Phrase' with that website?

two.message: Anyone with your 'Secret Recovery Phrase' can ~empty your account~ remotely.

three.message: Official staff ~have no reason~ to ask you for it.
